attributes.action: Legal requirement for all covering and teaching classes in England must hold QTS
attributes.additional_details: There is an urgent need for the Department of Education to introduce new legislation or an amendment, making it a illegal for schools and academies to use people without qualified teacher status to cover, supervise or teach classes in England. Educational standards are maintained for all pupils
